metadata.title: CVE-2020-10108 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In Twisted Web through 19.10.0, there was an HTTP request splittingvulnerability. When presented with two content-length headers, it ignoredthe first header. When the second content-length value was set to zero, therequest body was interpreted as a pipelined request.

criterions.comment: twisted: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
twisted: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
